Name: EMBERZONE
About the game: EMBERZONE - This story is about Sarah, a 24-year-old girl. Her life wasn't much different from the lives of millions of others Americans. Sarah was interned as a journalist, but there's nothing special about it because many girls at her age choose to work in this field. In general, her whole life was quite calm and measured, but one day changed everything. Gameplay: - Linear horror story with a speaker in the background - A short 15-20 minute game that can be completed at a time - Walk around locations, talk with NPCs, find out what happened to the main character sig:0x7c0a56beda501890cc6cf604000dc2d2251cc23c9a69a63d5d9bff6cd0292c8855d6cd9d0c9443796e0db0bbd952d19b6b4a61c264fcc3cb0366954e10f2a28e1c p12.network-GameFi ecosystem-Editor|Infra|Econs
